{
	stories {
        id
        name
        views{
            ... on StoryViewHeader{
            content
            level
        }
        ... on StoryViewMarkdown{
            content
        }
        }
	}
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.stories.0.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
  "data": {
    "stories": [
      {
        "name": "mystory",
        "views": [
          {
            "content": "Header",
            "level": 1
          },
          {
            "content": "Markdown description"
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}

STORE story_id=data.stories.0.id
